channel.title: Contributing on (PCC)^2 Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Contributing on (PCC)^2 Wiki

item.title: Adding a new page
item.description: How to add a page or chapter to this Wiki If you want to add a section or an entire guide, you’ll likely want to Install Hugo, and a editor that helps with writing Markdown. I like Visual Studio Code.

item.title: Editing a page
item.description: How to edit a page For minor changes, go to the Github This is where the section will be on making a pull request to do things like fix typos

item.title: Opening an Issue
item.description: How to report an error or ask for a feature If you have a request for a guide or other ideas for this site do Here I’ll have a section about creating issues on github
